title: Relaxed Sunshine Coast Self-Contained Apartment Stay with Beach Access
description: Gather friends and family and escape to the Sunshine Coast for a relaxing stay at the The Sebel Twin Waters. Just moments from the sands of Mudjimba Beach, and boasting a private saltwater lagoon, you'll be in an unbeatable location close to everything the Sunshine Coast has on offer. Enjoy the convenience of self-contained apartment living together with the facilities of the adjacent Novotel Sunshine Coast Resort, including its restaurants, bars and pools.
offer_address: 80 North Shore Road Twin Waters, Twin Waters, Queensland, Australia, 4564
